original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.7. Hetuduka, Pītittika🔽Hetuṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Hetuṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetuduka pītittika  hetum pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  hetum sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
